member.name: T:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList
member.summary: This class encapsulates the logic for a recent file list.
member.remarks: This class can be used in a Settings file to store and load the recent file list as user settings. In Visual Studio you might need to enter the full class name "System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList" in the "Select a type" dialog.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.Load(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Waf.Applications.RecentFile})
member.summary: Loads the specified collection into the recent file list. Use this method when you need to initialize the RecentFileList manually. This can be useful when you are using an own persistence implementation.
member.remarks: Recent file items that exist before the Load method is called are removed.
member.exception: The argument recentFiles must not be null.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.AddFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the recent file list. If the file already exists in the list then it only changes the position in the list.
member.param: The path of the recent file.
member.exception: The argument fileName must not be null or empty.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.Remove(System.Waf.Applications.RecentFile)
member.summary: Removes the specified recent file.
member.exception: The argument recentFile must not be null.
The argument recentFile was not found in the recent files list.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.RecentFiles
member.summary: Gets the list of recent files.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Applications.RecentFileList.MaxFilesNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of recent files in the list.
member.remarks: If the set number is lower than the list count then the recent file list is truncated to the number.
member.exception: The value must be equal or larger than 1.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.GetErrors
member.summary: Gets the validation errors for the entire entity.
member.returns: The validation errors for the entity.

member.summary: Gets the validation errors for a specified property or for the entire entity.

member.returns: The validation errors for the property or entity.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.Validate
member.summary: Validates the object and all its properties. The validation results are stored and can be retrieved by the GetErrors method. If the validation results are changing then the ErrorsChanged event will be raised.
member.returns: True if the object is valid, otherwise false.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.SetPropertyAndValidate``1(``0@,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Set the property with the specified value and validate the property. If the value is not equal with the field then the field is set, a PropertyChanged event is raised, the property is validated and it returns true.
member.param: Reference to the backing field of the property.
The new value for the property.
The property name. This optional parameter can be skipped because the compiler is able to create it automatically.
member.returns: True if the value has changed, false if the old and new value were equal.
member.exception: The argument propertyName must not be null or empty.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.ValidateProperty(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Validates the property with the specified value. The validation results are stored and can be retrieved by the GetErrors method. If the validation results are changing then the ErrorsChanged event will be raised.
member.param: The property name. This optional parameter can be skipped because the compiler is able to create it automatically.
member.returns: True if the property value is valid, otherwise false.
member.exception: The argument propertyName must not be null or empty.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.OnErrorsChanged(System.ComponentModel.DataErrorsChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.HasErrors
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the entity has validation errors.

member.name: E:System.Waf.Foundation.ValidatableModel.ErrorsChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the validation errors have changed for a property or for the entire entity.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.BoolToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Value converter that converts a boolean value to and from Visibility enumeration values.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.BoolToVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a boolean value into a Visibility enumeration value.
member.param: The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
Use the string 'Invert' to get an inverted result (Visible and Collapsed are exchanged). Do not specify this parameter if the default behavior is desired.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: Visible when the boolean value was true; otherwise Collapsed.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.BoolToVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a Visibility enumeration value into a boolean value.
member.param: The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
Use the string 'Invert' to get an inverted result (true and false are exchanged). Do not specify this parameter if the default behavior is desired.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: true when the Visibility enumeration value was Visible; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.BoolToVisibilityConverter.Default
member.summary: Gets the default instance of this converter.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.InvertBooleanConverter
member.summary: Value converter that inverts a boolean value.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.InvertBooleanConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a boolean value into the inverted value.
member.param: The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
The converter parameter to use. This parameter will be ignored.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: The inverter boolean value.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.InvertBooleanConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a boolean value into the inverted value.
member.param: The type to convert to. This parameter will be ignored.
The converter parameter to use. This parameter will be ignored.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: The inverter boolean value.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.InvertBooleanConverter.Default
member.summary: Gets the default instance of this converter.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.StringFormatConverter
member.summary: Value converter that converts an object into a formatted string. The format specification is passed via the ConverterParameter property.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.StringFormatConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts an object into a formatted string.
member.param: The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
The format specification used to format the object.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: The formatted string.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.StringFormatConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: This method is not supported and throws an exception when it is called.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: Nothing because this method throws an exception.
member.exception: Throws this exception when the method is called.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.StringFormatConverter.Default
member.summary: Gets the default instance of this converter.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter
member.summary: Multi value converter that converts a collection to a multi-line string error message. Use the binding for the second value to update the target when the collection changes. Set the path of the second binding on the Count property: Binding Path="(Validation.Errors).Count".

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a collection of objects into a multi-line string of error messages.
member.param: The first value is the collection of objects.
The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
The converter parameter to use. This parameter will be ignored.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A multi-line error message or an empty string when the collection contains no errors. If the first value parameter is null or not of the type IEnumerable<ValidationError> this method returns .

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: This method is not supported and throws an exception when it is called.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The array of types to convert to.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: Nothing because this method throws an exception.
member.exception: Throws this exception when the method is called.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: OBSOLETE: Converts a collection of objects into a multi-line string of error messages.
member.param: The type of the binding target property. This parameter will be ignored.
The converter parameter to use. This parameter will be ignored.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A multi-line error message or an empty string when the collection contains no errors. If the value parameter is null or not of the type IEnumerable<ValidationError> this method returns .

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: OBSOLETE: This method is not supported and throws an exception when it is called.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: Nothing because this method throws an exception.
member.exception: Throws this exception when the method is called.

member.name: P:System.Waf.Presentation.Converters.ValidationErrorsConverter.Default
member.summary: Gets the default instance of this converter.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.FileDialogService
member.summary: This is the default implementation of the interface. It shows an open or save file dialog box.
member.remarks: If the default implementation of this service doesn't serve your need then you can provide your own implementation.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.FileDialogService.ShowOpenFileDialog(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Waf.Applications.Services.FileType},System.Waf.Applications.Services.FileType,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the open file dialog box that allows a user to specify a file that should be opened.
member.param: The window that owns this OpenFileDialog.
Default filename. The directory name is used as initial directory when it is specified.
member.returns: A FileDialogResult object which contains the filename selected by the user.
member.exception: fileTypes must contain at least one item.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.FileDialogService.ShowSaveFileDialog(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Waf.Applications.Services.FileType},System.Waf.Applications.Services.FileType,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the save file dialog box that allows a user to specify a filename to save a file as.
member.param: The window that owns this SaveFileDialog.
Default filename. The directory name is used as initial directory when it is specified.
member.returns: A FileDialogResult object which contains the filename entered by the user.
member.exception: fileTypes must contain at least one item.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService
member.summary: This is the default implementation of the interface. It shows messages via the MessageBox to the user.
member.remarks: If the default implementation of this service doesn't serve your need then you can provide your own implementation.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService.ShowMessage(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the message.
member.param: The window that owns this Message Window.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService.ShowWarning(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the message as warning.
member.param: The window that owns this Message Window.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService.ShowError(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the message as error.
member.param: The window that owns this Message Window.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService.ShowQuestion(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the specified question.
member.param: The window that owns this Message Window.
member.returns: true for yes, false for no and null for cancel.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.Services.MessageService.ShowYesNoQuestion(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Shows the specified yes/no question.
member.param: The window that owns this Message Window.
member.returns: true for yes and false for no.

member.name: T:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper
member.summary: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation tracking. This works only if NotifyOnValidationError=true is set by every Binding that participates in data validation.

member.name: F:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.IsEnabledProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsEnabled attached property. This property contains the value that indicates whether the ValidationHelper is enabled.

member.name: F:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.IsValidProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsValid attached property. This property contains the value that indicates whether the associated object is valid.
member.remarks: This is a readonly property. However, it is allowed to define a Binding with the Mode=OneWayToSource for this property.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.GetIsEnabled(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the ValidationHelper is enabled.
member.param: The object to read the value from.
member.returns: true, if the ValidationHelper is enabled.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.SetIsEnabled(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the value that indicates whether the ValidationHelper is enabled. The default value is 'false'. It is not allowed to call this method with 'false'.
member.param: The object to set the value to.
if set to true then the ValidationHelper is enabled for the specified object.
member.exception: The value must not be set to 'false'.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.GetIsValid(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is valid.
member.param: The object to read the value from.
member.returns: true, if the object is valid.

member.name: M:System.Waf.Presentation.ValidationHelper.SetIsValid(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Do not call this method. It is for internal use only.
member.param: The object to set the value to.
if set to true then the object is valid.
member.exception: Thrown when this method is called.

member.name: T:System.Waf.WafConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration settings for the WPF Application Framework (WAF).

member.name: P:System.Waf.WafConfiguration.IsInDesignMode
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the code is running in design mode.
member.value: true if the code is running in design mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Waf.WafConfiguration.Debug
member.summary: Obsolete: Gets or sets a value indicating whether WAF should run in Debug mode.
member.remarks: The Debug mode helps to find errors in the application but it might reduce the performance.
